description: Files with hardcoded cache times that should use CACHE_TIMES

examples: staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes - dashboard stats don't change frequently
staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes - dashboard stats don't change frequently
staleTime: 30 * 60 * 1000, // 30 minutes - companies don't change often
const isInsuranceExpiringSoon = new Date(vehicle.insuranceExpiry) < new Date(Date.now() + 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
const isRegistrationExpiringSoon = new Date(vehicle.registrationExpiry) < new Date(Date.now() + 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
staleTime: 30 * 60 * 1000, // 30 minutes - companies don't change often
staleTime: 2 * 60 * 1000, // 2 minutes (increased from 10s for better caching)
gcTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes in cache (renamed from cacheTime in React Query v5)
const urgentDate = new Date(today.getTime() + 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) // 7 days from now
toDate: new Date(Date.now() + 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000), // 1 year from now
staleTime: 2 * 60 * 1000, // 2 minutes (increased from 10s for better caching)
staleTime: 1000 * 60 * 60, // 1 hour - policy doesn't change often
staleTime: 1000 * 60 * 60, // 1 hour - policy doesn't change often
gcTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes in cache (renamed from cacheTime in React Query v5)
const AUTH_GRACE_PERIOD = 30 * 60 * 1000 // 30 minutes - trust cached user for extended period

description: Files with direct queryClient.invalidateQueries that should use invalidateCache

examples: return await queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: billingKeys.statistics(), refetchType: 'all' })
return await queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: activityKeys.recent(), refetchType: 'all' })
return await queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: organizationsKeys.all, refetchType: 'all' })
* - To invalidate specific queries: queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['key'] })
'  - queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [...] }) to invalidate specific queries | لإبطال استعلامات محددة\n' +
return await queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['tasks', taskId, 'documents', documentId] })

description: Files with hardcoded query keys that should use QueryKeys factory

examples: * - To invalidate specific queries: queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['key'] })
queryKey: ['contacts', filters],  // Simple key like useClients uses

description: Files with magic numbers that could be centralized in config

examples: * const { webhooks, total } = await webhookService.getWebhooks({ page: 1, limit: 20 })
const { data: receiptsData } = usePurchaseReceipts({ purchaseOrderId, limit: 10 })
const { data: invoicesData } = usePurchaseInvoices({ purchaseOrderId, limit: 10 })
const { data: wpsData, isLoading: loadingWPS } = useWPSFiles({ limit: 5 })
const { data: paymentsData, isLoading: loadingSADAD } = useSADADPayments({ limit: 5 })
* Usage: const { data, isLoading } = useAuditLogs({ page: 1, limit: 50 })
limit: 1000, // Get a large number to calculate accurate stats
const { data: itemsData, isLoading: loadingItems } = useItems({ limit: 1000 })
const { data: ledgerData } = useStockLedger({ itemId, limit: 10 })
const { data: ledgerData } = useStockLedger({ page: 1, limit: 100 })
const { data: deliveriesData, isLoading } = useWebhookDeliveries(webhook._id, { limit: 50 })
const { data: purchaseOrdersData } = usePurchaseOrders({ supplierId, limit: 10 })
const { data: billsData } = useBills({ vendorId, limit: 5 })
const { data: logsData } = useVehicleLogs({ vehicleId, limit: 50 })
const { data: tasksData, isLoading: tasksLoading } = useUpcomingTasks({ limit: 5 })
const { data: transactionsData, isLoading: isLoadingTransactions } = useTransactions({ limit: 10 })
const MAX_CONSECUTIVE_401 = 10 // Very high threshold - almost never auto-logout

description: Files with duplicate Zod schemas that could use shared-schemas
Files with hardcoded API endpoints that could be centralized
Files with console statements that should be removed or use proper logging

examples: console.error('Failed to fetch reports | فشل في جلب التقارير:', error)
console.error(`Failed to fetch report ${id} | فشل في جلب التقرير ${id}:`, error)
console.log('%c🔍 API Debug ENABLED', 'color: #00ff00; font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px')
console.log('All API calls will now show their source location.')
console.warn(`[CacheManager] Failed to set key "${key}":`, error)
console.warn(`[CacheManager] Failed to get key "${key}":`, error)
console.error('Failed to update block position:', error)
console.error('Failed to update block size:', error)
console.warn('[BACKEND-PENDING] Message stats endpoint not available (/messages/stats), returning defaults')
console.warn('[BACKEND-PENDING] CRM stats endpoint not available (/dashboard/crm-stats), returning defaults')
console.warn('[OfflineStorage] Failed to save offline data:', error)
console.warn('[OfflineStorage] Failed to retrieve offline data:', error)
console.error('Failed to fetch setup status:', error)
console.error(`Failed to mark ${module} as complete:`, error)
console.warn('[usersService] Team endpoint not implemented yet, returning empty array')
console.warn('[usersService] Team members endpoint not implemented yet, returning empty array')
